name: CHANG SHU - Founder, Project Manager
content: 5 Years experience in blockchain, over 7 years of business experience. Core team of many projects.

name: MIN JUN - Technical Leader
content: 5+ Years experience in blockchain, from alt currency design to trading algorithms. Architect for 2 Altcoins and 5 IDO projects.

name: MASAHIKO - NFT Artist
content: Education: Art Department, Washburn University. 4+ Years of experience as an NFT artist.

name: BANG YEONG - Marketing Manager
content: 6+ Years experience as Marketing Manager. Build and lead the crypto marketing team. She is experienced with social media, content marketing, video production.

name: KYEONG YOUNG - Finance Manager
content: 9+ Years experience as Finance Manager. Support the preparation of the SBC head office's yearly operating budget. Oversee the finance aspects at Head Office and support SBC operations.
